thread.section_title: LuxHair Wigs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LuxHair Wigs | www.luxhair.com
thread.title: Julia Gould
thread.title_full: LuxHair Wigs reviewed by Julia Gould

author: Julia Gould
title: Julia Gould
text:
I have never worn a wig before. I liked the video with Sherri. It made me think I should take a chance especially with her "Girlfriend Gurantee", how can you go wrong.
Wish I had match the color I really wanted. Should have ordered my textured pixie in auburn blonde. I am already looking to purchase another one.
Thank you Sherri Shepard!
Funny the wig is so close to my own hair style and color, when I see people that know me they asked, wow when did you cut your hair.
